Title: Directs the department of transportation to create a system so that trucks only have to go though one department of transportation safety checkpoint per day
Summary: Directs the department of transportation to create a system, whether through stickers, decals, or otherwise, so that trucks only have to go through one department of transportation safety checkpoint per day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to directing the department of transportation to implement a system to reduce time spent at multiple department of transportation checkpoints in the same day
